name: Majesco's Rec Room Challenge: 3 Games in One - Darts / Roll-a-Ball / Shuffle Bowl
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Advance (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

Now you can challenge yourself with three popular recreational games, all on one Game Pak! Fine-tune your aim in classic dart games, master strikes and spares in Shuffle Bowling and connect with targets in Roll-a-Ball to net the high score!

(screenshot captions)

Aim your color-changing cylinders in Roll-a-Ball Arcade Mode!

Score big points with each push of the puck in Shuffle Bowling Lightning Mode

Play three fun-filled dart games including Cricket, 501 and Baseball!

releases.country: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland
